name: Pluto
description: Increases High Card hand value by +1 Mult and +10 Chip

name: Mercury
description: Increases Pair hand value by +1 Mult and +15 Chips

name: Uranus
description: Increases Two Pair hand value by +1 Mult and +20 Chips

name: Venus
description: Increases Three of a Kind hand value by +2 Mult and +20 Chips

name: Saturn
description: Increases Straight hand value by +3 Mult and +30 Chips

name: Jupiter
description: Increases Flush hand value by +2 Mult and +15 Chips

name: Earth
description: Increases Full House hand value by +2 Mult and +25 Chips

name: Mars
description: Increases Four of a Kind hand value by +3 Mult and +30 Chips

name: Neptune
description: Increases Straight Flush hand value by +4 Mult and +40 Chips

name: Planet X
description: Increases Five of a Kind hand value by +3 Mult and +35 Chips

name: Ceres
description: Increases Flush House hand value by +4 Mult and +40 Chips

name: Eris
description: Increases Flush Five hand value by +3 Mult and +50 Chips
